tasks.task: Operating advanced agricultural machinery and vehicles
subtasks: Driving a Munov Harvest Machine for apple harvesting (including adjusting cutting height and speed, ensuring precision)

Controlling the Compact Flower Pot Transport Robot for efficient pot transport over varied terrain (maneuvering and loading/unloading)
Operating an OB-100 root-picking machine (starting the machine, adjusting depth, ensuring effective root lifting)
Using the Rupa Keo 2 potato harvester (loading bales, monitoring capacity, checking potato transport)
Operating a Green Onion Harvester for large-scale harvesting (managing machine speed, ensuring coverage, verifying onion collection)
Driving a John Deere 6150R for bale loading (safe operation, stacking bales, checking attachment connections)
Understanding the John Deere 6620 bale press operation (monitoring performance, adjusting settings for optimal bale density)

tasks.task: Observing and understanding poultry farming technology
subtasks: Assisting with chick care after hatching (nutrition, immediate hygiene, monitoring growth)

Supervising watermelon washing and packing (quality checks, maintaining hygiene, coordinating staff)
Processing mangoes in the factory (grading, washing, packaging)
Operating a C485 lawn mower for field maintenance (adjusting blades, checking battery, mowing terrain)
Applying precision weed control using a GPS-guided robot (setting parameters, verifying results)
Managing a robust plowing machine for new planting (adjusting share width, depth, checking soil condition)
